alert.note: Alert for Choctaw; Clay; Lowndes; Oktibbeha; Webster (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued November 29 at 7:33PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM CST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall is possible. * WHERE...Portions of central Mississippi, north central Mississippi and northeast Mississippi, including the following counties, in central Mississippi, Choctaw. In north central Mississippi, Webster. In northeast Mississippi, Clay, Lowndes and Oktibbeha. * WHEN...Until 6 AM CST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Multiple rounds of showers and thunderstorms capable of producing heavy rain will develop and move across the watch area tonight. Additional rainfall on already saturated ground will quickly run off and could lead to additional flooding. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.
